text: @NYGovCuomo .These numbers are on YOU.  SO MANY DEATHS they had to distinguish them between New York State and New York City. Almost 40% death rate in NYC thanks to you sending positives to nursing homes, hoarding PPE/respirators, and keeping trains/subways running.  https://t.co/bDctI2YVSi
